It is always our top priority to maintain a healthy flight for all our valuable guests and crew!

For more information: https://t.co/sCyVo0X2xf

#TurkishAirlines https://t.co/r7DOz5WrPe

data.text:
✈️
In this little break we've all taken, we missed these voices, smiling faces and eyes full of affection! 

We will soon fly together in those deep blue skies again. 

Till then, we wish you a happy Eid with your loved ones! 

#MissedALot #EidMubarak https://t.co/VjyQsGX8c1

data.text:
✈️🌙

We’d love to see your recreations. Please tag @TurkishAirlines to let us know! 

#BonAppetit #EidDessert https://t.co/50vte9fimT

data.text:
✈️🇹🇷
Today marks the 101st anniversary of Turkish National Movement that started with Ghazi Mustafa Kemal Atatürk's landing in Samsun! 

Thanks to millions who took the commemorative #HistoricJourney to Samsun with us today, carrying the spirit of unity. 

Have a happy May 19th! https://t.co/zGOMxUvDHP

data.text:
✈️🇹🇷
As we celebrate the centennial of our National Assembly, we are thankful to our colleagues who created the largest ever Turkish flag in the sky, and to our Glorious Nation who joined us from their homes. 

Our flag will always be waving in the skies!

#FlagInTheSkies #TK1920 https://t.co/DuHYEFE39Q

#TurkishAirlines #FlagInTheSkies #April23rd #TK1920 https://t.co/5zkzKwfrrW

data.text:
Thank you, @IndiGo6E!

Our birds are also staying safely at home. We are looking forward to seeing them in the air soon.

Make sure you keep the social distance for the health of all!

What about you, @FlyAirNZ, @qatarairways, @ThaiAirways?

#WeAreAviation #WeWillSucceedTogether https://t.co/kPXNVr73ea https://t.co/r2GSi1M8le

data.text:
✈️
Dear passengers;

Since domestic travel can be made with the permission of the Governor's Office, our domestic ticket sales have been suspended for a short time until the necessary communication infrastructure is established with the Ministry of Interior.

#TurkishAirlines https://t.co/s4qX2Wbhhx
